text:
ISBN-13: 9781584281344.
ISBN-10: 1584281340.
Title: Posing for Portrait Photography.
Subtitle: A Head-to-toe Guide.
Authors: Jeff Smith.
Categories: Photography.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=CzPBwAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Jeff Smith teaches surefire techniques for achieving flattering results, detailing the principles of posing the entire body - head, shoulders, arms, hands, bust, waist, hips, thighs and feet. With an emphasis on creating images that will sell themselves, readers will learn to correct common figure problems and design poses that look natural, crafting images that clients are sure to love..
